name: Labyrinthos (itch) (LabyrinthosProject)
description: Labyrinthos is a Co-op, Puzzle game for children. Set on an adventure together with a friend as a cat or mouse who run deep within the Great Palace of Knossos, after the cat named Ailouros chased after the mouse named Clyomys where they find themselves inside the Labyrinth together, they find themselves working together in order to get out while avoiding the minotaur.
